title: ChiBitCTy
author: ChiBitCTy
created_time: August 08, 2022, 11:35:59 PMLast edit: August 08, 2022, 11:52:50 PM by ChiBitCTy
content: Just got my silver Alpen bar in the mail (she’s a beauty) and received #25 of 200. I am hoping to make a pair of the same serial numbers, so wondering if whomever got the #25 gold Alpen bar would be willing to trade it to me for my gold #76 bar plus maybe a little extra. As a side note- Mopar is trying to pair my #76 gold bar with his #76 silver Alpen bar. Unfortunately atm he doesn’t have a gold bar to trade for it, so hopefully if I’m able to make this trade, the person I trade with might be willing  to eventually trade it to Mopar so he can complete a matching set with his favorite number (#76).  (Also anyone please feel free to use this thread to try and do the same if you’ve got an unmatched pair of Alpen bars)

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: appreciate it! have had people approach me to sell me theirs but the lowest offer was 3x the price they sold for, a premium that high is not worth it to me. But yes - I am still trying to find one for sale to trade for #76
